Substitution.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Substitution (_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', formKey varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', dateSubst date NOT NULL, period varchar(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', type varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Sonstige', lesson varchar(10) NOT NULL , lessonSubst varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', room varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', roomSubst varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', annotation varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
Substitution.insert: INSERT INTO Substitution (formKey, dateSubst, period, type, lesson, lessonSubst, room, roomSubst, annotation ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

Events.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Events (_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', title varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', eventDate date NOT NULL, description varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
Events.insert: INSERT INTO Events (title, eventDate, description) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
